H0.text: who was the last nba player to get drafted out of high school. Andrew Bynum

H1.text: who was the last nba player to get drafted out of high school. Monta Ellis

H2.text: who was the last nba player to get drafted out of high school. Dwight Howard

H3.text: who was the last nba player to get drafted out of high school. Thon Maker

A4.text: The 2005 NBA draft was the last year that a player could be drafted straight out of high school.

A5.text: In his second season, Bynum was still the youngest player in the league, due to his draft year being the last that a player could be drafted straight out of high school.
